item.text: From Simeon Peter, a slave and apostle of Jesus Christ, to those who through the righteousness of our God and Savior, Jesus Christ, have been granted a faith just as precious as ours.
May grace and peace be lavished on you as you grow in the rich knowledge of God and of Jesus our Lord!
I can pray this because his divine power has bestowed on us everything necessary for life and godliness through the rich knowledge of the one who called us by his own glory and excellence.

<st data-num="1223" class="">Through</st> <st data-num="3739">these things</st><n id="1" /> he has <st data-num="1433" class="">bestowed</st> on <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> his <st data-num="5093" class="">precious</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3173">most magnificent</st> <st data-num="1862" class="">promises</st>, <st data-num="2443" class="">so that</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">by means of</st> <st data-num="3778">what was promised</st><n id="2" /> you may <st data-num="1096" class="">become</st> <st data-num="2844" class="">partakers</st> of the <st data-num="2304" class="">divine</st> <st data-num="5449" class="">nature</st>,<n id="3" /> after <st data-num="668" class="">escaping</st><n id="4" /> the <st data-num="2889" class="">worldly</st> <st data-num="5356" class="">corruption</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">that</st> is produced <st data-num="1722" class="">by</st> <st data-num="1939">evil desire</st>.<n id="5" />

<st data-num="2532">For</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="836">very</st> <st data-num="4710" class="">reason</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3923" class="">make</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">every</st> <st data-num="3923" class="">effort</st><n id="2" /> to <st data-num="2023" class="">add</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">to</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st> <st data-num="703" class="">excellence</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">to</st> <st data-num="703" class="">excellence</st>, <st data-num="1108">knowledge</st>;

<st data-num="1722" class="">to</st> <st data-num="1108" class="">knowledge</st>, <st data-num="1466" class="">self-control;</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">to</st> <st data-num="1466" class="">self-control</st>, <st data-num="5281" class="">perseverance</st>;<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">to</st> <st data-num="5281" class="">perseverance</st>, <st data-num="2150">godliness</st>;

<st data-num="1722" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2150" class="">godliness</st>, <st data-num="5360" class="">brotherly affection</st>; <st data-num="1722" class="">to</st> <st data-num="5360" class="">brotherly affection</st>, unselfish<n id="1" /> <st data-num="26" class="">love</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> if<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3778">these things</st> <st data-num="5225" class="">are</st> really <st data-num="4771" class="">yours</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3761" class="">and</st> are continually <st data-num="4121" class="">increasing</st>,<n id="3" /> they will <st data-num="2525" class="">keep</st> you from <st data-num="2525" class="">becoming</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="692" class="">ineffective</st> <st data-num="3761" class="">and</st> <st data-num="175" class="">unproductive</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> your pursuit of<n id="5" /> <st data-num="1922" class="">knowing</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> more intimately.<n id="6" />

<st data-num="1063">But</st><n id="1" /> concerning the <st data-num="3739">one</st> who <st data-num="3361 3918">lacks</st> <st data-num="3778">such things</st><n id="2" />—he <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="5185" class="">blind</st>. That is to say, he is<n id="3" /> <st data-num="3467" class="">nearsighted</st>, since he has <st data-num="3024" class="">forgotten</st> about the <st data-num="2512" class="">cleansing</st> of <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3819" class="">past</st> <st data-num="266" class="">sins</st>.

<st data-num="1352" class="">Therefore</st>, <st data-num="80">brothers and sisters</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="4704" class="">make</st> <st data-num="3123" class="">every</st> <st data-num="4704" class="">effort</st> to be <st data-num="949" class="">sure</st> of <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="2821" class="">calling</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1589" class="">election</st>.<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> by <st data-num="4160" class="">doing</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st><n id="3" /> you will <st data-num="3756 3361">never</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="4417">stumble into sin</st>.<n id="5" />
For thus an entrance into the eternal kingdom of our Lord and Savior, Jesus Christ, will be richly provided for you.
Therefore, I intend to remind you constantly of these things even though you know them and are well established in the truth that you now have.

<st data-num="1161">Indeed</st>, <st data-num="3745">as long as</st> I <st data-num="1510" class="">am</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="4638" class="">tabernacle</st>,<n id="1" /> I <st data-num="2233" class="">consider</st> it <st data-num="1342" class="">right</st> to <st data-num="1326" class="">stir</st> <st data-num="4771">you</st> <st data-num="1326" class="">up</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">by</st> way of a <st data-num="5280" class="">reminder</st>,

since I <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="4638" class="">tabernacle</st> will <st data-num="5031" class="">soon</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="595" class="">removed</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2531" class="">because</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="1213" class="">revealed</st> this to <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>.<n id="3" />
Indeed, I will also make every effort that, after my departure, you have a testimony of these things.
For we did not follow cleverly concocted fables when we made known to you the power and return of our Lord Jesus Christ; no, we were eyewitnesses of his grandeur.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> he <st data-num="2983" class="">received</st> <st data-num="5092" class="">honor</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1391" class="">glory</st> <st data-num="3844" class="">from</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> the <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st>, when <st data-num="5107">that</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="5456" class="">voice</st> was <st data-num="5342" class="">conveyed</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="3169" class="">Majestic</st> <st data-num="1391" class="">Glory:</st> “<st data-num="3778">This</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="27" class="">dear</st> <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st>, <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">whom</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> am <st data-num="2106" class="">delighted</st>.”<n id="2" />

When <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="5456" class="">voice</st> was <st data-num="5342" class="">conveyed</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st>, we <st data-num="1473" class="">ourselves</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> it, for we <st data-num="1510" class="">were</st> <st data-num="4862" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="40" class="">holy</st> <st data-num="3735" class="">mountain</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">Moreover</st>,<n id="1" /> we<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2192" class="">possess</st> the <st data-num="4397" class="">prophetic</st> <st data-num="3056" class="">word</st> as an <st data-num="949">altogether reliable thing</st>.<n id="3" /> You <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> <st data-num="2573" class="">well</st> if you <st data-num="4337">pay attention</st><n id="4" /> to this<n id="5" /> <st data-num="5613" class="">as</st> you would<n id="6" /> to a <st data-num="3088" class="">light</st> <st data-num="5316" class="">shining</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> a <st data-num="850" class="">murky</st> <st data-num="5117" class="">place</st>, <st data-num="2193" class="">until</st> the <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st> <st data-num="1306" class="">dawns</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="5459">morning star</st><n id="7" /> <st data-num="393" class="">rises</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="2588" class="">hearts</st>.<n id="8" />

<st data-num="4413" class="">Above all</st>, you do well if you <st data-num="1097" class="">recognize</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3778">this</st>:<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3756" class="">No</st> <st data-num="4394" class="">prophecy</st> of <st data-num="1124" class="">scripture</st> ever <st data-num="1096">comes about</st> by the <st data-num="2398">prophet’s own</st> <st data-num="1955" class="">imagination</st>,<n id="3" />
for no prophecy was ever borne of human impulse; rather, men carried along by the Holy Spirit spoke from God.
